byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Jess Bidgood from Boston, Ian Lovett from Los Angeles, Jada F. Smith from Washington, Stacey Solie from Seattle, Dan Frosch from Denver, Steven Yaccino from Chicago, Robbie Brown from Atlanta, and Rob Harris and Cara Buckley from New York.

snippet: Newcomers to the anti-Wall Street protests and new police tactics for dealing with the growing demonstrations are combining to pose fresh risks of more confrontations for both.
lead_paragraph: Newcomers to the anti-Wall Street protests and new police tactics for dealing with the growing demonstrations are combining to pose fresh risks of more confrontations for both.

headline.main: Response of the Police Is Expanding With Protests
headline.print_headline: Response Of the Police Is Expanding With Protests
